messages.title: A RECORD OF ACTION IN CHICHESTER
messages.content: Andrew Tyrie has fought for local communities and services across the Chichester constituency.

messages.title: 3 REASONS TO VOTE FOR ANDREW TYRIE
messages.content: Standing up for the Chichester District, Standing up for his beliefs, Calling for National Labour to act.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Government proposals would have abandoned parts of Selsey to erosion and flooding. Andrew's campaign has helped to oppose this.
Andrew is determined to get to the truth on Britain’s involvement in the US programme of rendition - that is, kidnap and illegal detention of terrorist suspects.
Andrew has worked tirelessly to help local people and has taken up the issues that matter to them.
Andrew's campaign against the Labour government's plans for swapping Post Office closures helped save Parklands Post Office.

issues.economy: A sound economy under the Conservatives mentioned in campaign material.
issues.environment: Protest against Westminstershore wind farm depicted in image.
issues.governance: Restoring trust issue mentioned in campaign material.
issues.health: An NHS for patients mentioned in campaign material.

housing.content: Homes: local choice mentioned in campaign material.

politicalExperience.achievements: Fought for local communities and services across the Chichester constituency.

endorsements.endorsement: You are an MP who splendid examples to us and is supported wholeheartedly by us.
Andrew was fantastic in stirring up people we finally got the Post Office to listen. Working with us. We toast his success.
Thank you for being from Reepie - sick two Homes. It was ministerially good of You to take stock - stable as our light reached you to use your influence.
We're lucky to have such a strong local campaigning MP. He's provided the leadership and support we need to protect Selsey and the Manhood Development Reference, on coast and much more.

images.caption: Various images depicting Andrew Tyrie in action and endorsements from constituents.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Images with text have been paraphrased to capture the essence of the messages due to image resolution constraints.
